DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Universal
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: A generalist wizard, not specializing in any one school, nor are they prohibited from any.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Abjuration
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that protect, banish, or block. Abjurers are masters of defensive magic.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Conjuration
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that bring creatures or materials to the caster. Conjurers are masters of summoning and creation.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Divination
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that reveal information. Diviners are masters of remote viewing, prophecy, and scrying.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Enchantment
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that imbue the recipient with some property or grant the caster power over another being. Enchanters are masters of charms and compulsions.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Evocation
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that manipulate energy or create something from nothing. Evokers are masters of destructive energy spells.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Illusion
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that alter perception or create false images. Illusionists are masters of deception and phantasms.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Necromancy
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that manipulate the power of death, unlife, and the life force. Necromancers are masters of undead and life-draining effects.

DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.label: Transmutation
DND_MAGIC_SCHOOLS_DATA.description: Spells that change the properties of some creature, thing, or condition. Transmuters are masters of alteration and physical enhancement.
